title: Salute to Adventurers
author: Buchan, John
snippet: He had the whine and sough inhis voice that our sectaries prized, and I could shut my eyes andimagine I was back in the little kirk of Lesmahagow on a hot summermorn.

title: Salute to Adventurers
author: Buchan, John
snippet: What did they teach you at Lesmahagow if yedon't know that Ringan is the Scots for Ninian?

title: Salute to Adventurers
author: Buchan, John
snippet: He had castout with the Hamilton gentry, and, having broken the head of a dragoonin the change-house of Lesmahagow, had his little estate mulcted infines.
